channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Dead fox in Road, 26th July
item.description:
Dead fox in road on entrance to Sanderstead Road. Happened in last hour 10pm Sat night
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 145, Lower Road, Poverest, London

item.title: Ion hole, 26th July
item.description:
There is an iron hole on the floor outside Williams toy shop.Beckham high street is considered very dangerous on the markings.There are not enough. This caused inconvenience as my mother fell to the ground with my daughter , who is four years old and damaged herself. We also have other witnesses and saw it happen. This could really cause a big problem to someone who is even more frail

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Coopers Mews, Beckenham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Car abandoned, 26th July
item.description:
This car has been abandoned for weeks in Foxhole Road. It is covered in birds poo and is just an eyesore. Also the road around it needs a good clean; there are broken bottles, etc. I hope you can just take it away as it will encourage others to dump cars there, if the car is not collected soon.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Foxhole Road, Well Hall, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street light not working outside 69 Star Lane, 26th July
item.description:
There’s a problem with the street light outside 69a star lane as it’s flickering on and off or goes off completely

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 69A, Star Lane, St Paul's Cray, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothole in centre of road on Northfield Avenue, near 23, 26th July
item.description:
Pothole in centre of road on Northfield Avenue, near 23, which has been getting bigger over recent weeks, though it runs along finer cracks which have been there formimg over months. It would be appreciated if it the pothole rectified.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Northfield Avenue, Poverest, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Weeds and untidy streets, 26th July
item.description:
The streets need weeding, they look untidy and are causing people to drop litter and also fly tip due to the horrible state of the pavements

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Daubeney Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Accident Hotspot, 26th July
item.description:
A few parking spots up to the bin need to be removed and replaced with double yellow lines. Currently there is a pinch point and I have witnessed multiple car accidents due to the pinch point it creates, causing vehicles to run into the kerb on one side, or into parked vehicles on the other, especially at busy times it also causes traffic jams in one direction.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 169, Sumner Road, Peckham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Raw meat and rubbish bags dumped, 26th July
item.description:
Next to the electrical box on the corner of Lullingstone Crescent and Borstal someone has dumped 2 maybe 3 black bags. Covered in flies and looks like raw meat. Not safe for local wildlife and smells very bad.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lullingstone Crescent, St Paul's Cray, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The graffiti on the fence, 26th July
item.description:
After driving through the A2 I noticed several graffiti signs on the fence, by Kidbrook Village. The whole of the A2 is littered with graffiti and it looks awful. Like a third world country and this should be cleared up. If you drive from Danson Park to the o2 please look at how much graffiti there is and looks disgusting. Please find a team to clear this
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Rochester Way Relief Road, Kidbrooke, London
Report on FixMyStreet
